title: HER DARK DESIRES: The Caring Dominant's First Touch. An Erotic Romance BDSM Short Story.
description: Can a strict and dominant man also be kind and caring? A troubled past has left Anna scared and anxious to be intimate again. She has a growing crush on the handsome and understanding entrepreneur Mark, who she started talking to on a BDSM forum. After several dates outside in public, she feels ready to go one step further. In this slow-build romantic, erotic short story, we meet her as she's getting ready to spend the night with him for the first time. His caring and stern dominant nature awaken Anna's forsaken submissive needs. What happens next is beyond what she ever imagined would happen tonight...
author: Lima-Me√≠ Summer
